description: Notifies that a FLOGI is denied on an F port of the local device.

event.Summary: FLOGI is denied on F port of the local device

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmFPortDenyNotify IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginPWWN s EXAMPLEE HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginIntf i 9999 HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginTime t 31536000

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The pWWN of the device whose FLOGI(Fabric Login) request had
been denied. If the device is an n-node, the value of the instance
of hpnicfFcPsmLoginSWWN should be zero-length string.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginPWWN

description: The ifindex of the port where the login was denied.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginIntf

description: Specifies the value of SysUpTime when the last denied login
happened.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginTime

description: Notifies that a switch is denied on an E port of the local device.

event.Summary: Switch is denied on an E port of the local device

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmEPortDenyNotify IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginSWWN s EXAMPLEE HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginIntf i 9999 HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginTime t 31536000

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The sWWN of the device whose FLOGI request had been denied.
If the device is a switch, the values of the instance of
hpnicfFcPsmLoginPWWN and hpnicfFcPsmLoginNWWN should be zero-length
string.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginSWWN

description: The ifindex of the port where the login was denied.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginIntf

description: Specifies the value of SysUpTime when the last denied login
happened.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-FC-PSM-MIB::hpnicfFcPsmLoginTime
